items.title: Real-time Team Collaboration
items.description: Enable multiple team members to view, update, and comment on tasks in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Multiple users can edit task details simultaneously without data loss
Comments on tasks appear instantly to all team members
Task status updates are reflected in real-time across all devices
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation
Real-time updates should have latency under 500ms

notes: Assumed that the core task management functionality exists and this requirement focuses on adding collaborative features.
